title: Hallow Hallow
description: Part role-playing game fantasy, part parody of various anime and game characters (Ayanami Rei from Evangelion, VIVI from Final Fantasy 9 and Vash the Stampede from Trigun), part fantasy adventure, this story-based manga from Youtarou Sena is a superior book of one full story. The story of Edward and The Priest, it is a Dungeons & Dragons or Castlevania type of world in which the pair must cross over a bridge and defeat the demons of each level to get to the castle to defeat Count Drachris.
